articles.author: Stan Choe
articles.title: DC’s shutdown hasn’t stopped the stock market. Here’s what may - AP News
articles.description: The U.S. stock market continues to rise despite the government's latest shutdown. The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average hit all-time highs on Friday. It's not just big tech driving the market; the Russell 2000 index of smaller stocks and gold also reac…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) If the U.S. governments latest shutdown cant stop the stock market, what can?

articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: If you’re not an AI startup, good luck raising money from VCs - TechCrunch
articles.description: New PitchBook data illustrates how dramatically AI is dominating startup investment, with 2025 on-track to become the first year when AI accounts for more than half of all VC money invested.
articles.content:
